      • getGrayAlgo

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getGrayAlgo(int nbits)
        Grey's algorithm 1. First start using (0) (1) and 2. copy the same elements and add but in reverse order 3. last half which starts at i until 2*i will be added 1 in fron by i | val 4. 0 1 1 0 so, last two 1 and 0, i=2 means 10 and 1 | 10 and 0 | 10 results 11 10 5. loop incremented by i=i<<1 so, from 10 to 100
